name: Bluff Wars - iOS/Android Game
blurb: A hilarious social trivia game with a twist - you don't need to know the answer, just make something up to trick your friends!

rewards.reward: Every dollar counts! For any donation, we will email you a copy of our bloopers/behind the scenes of our promo video!
For your donation, you'll receive the paid version of Bluff Wars, including all of the downloadable content and bonus categories, as well as the prizes from the previous tier!

IT'S DISCOUNT TIME, BRO!! You'll receive 3 copies of the paid version of Bluff Wars and all of the downloadable content! Share the game with 2 friends and start bluffing! And of course, you'll also get the bloopers and the HD wallpaper.
FREE GAMES FOR LIFE! For this generous donation, you will receive every game FangTooth Studios ever releases absolutely free! And yes, you get everything from the below tiers as well!
In addition to the rewards from the lower donation levels, you will receive an awesome Bluff Wars "Backer" T-shirt! Check out the pic on this page to see what you'll be receiving.
Do you have a favorite quote? Or a motto you live by? Immortalize your own personal quote by featuring it in our Quirky Quotes category! You will receive the rewards from the below tiers as well!

Are you an artist, author or indie filmmaker looking to get exposure for your work? Or is there a painting, book or movie you really love and would like to share with the world? Feature them as prompts in one of our categories and reach millions of potential viewers! You also receive all the rewards from the lower donation levels!

Become a creative contributor to Bluff Wars by meeting with the game designers for a 30-minute Google Hangouts session! In addition to the rewards from the lower donation levels, you will get to give us your input, ask us questions, and help decide what new content and ideas can be implemented to further enhance the social experience. Finally, your name will be included in the credits of the game!

You get a FangTooth Studios hoodie! Show your support in style with this unique and comfortable hoodie adorned with our snazzy logo. You'll get all of the prizes from the lower tiers, including the Bluff Wars T-shirt, so you'll probably never need to buy clothes again! Check out our page for pics.

With such a generous pledge, 15 lucky backers will have their name, birthday, and unique blurb appear in Bluff Wars as part of the Hysterical History category! Send us a brief description of yourself and we'll write you into the game! You will also receive all of the amazing rewards from the previous levels!!

Want to help lead this app to the top of the charts? For this very generous pledge you will not only get everything below but you will be one of seven Executive Producers for Bluff Wars! You will be listed in the credits as such, and your opinion will be sought out by our development team for every major decision. Finally, you will receive an exclusive branded pen with your name on it! Check out the sample picture on our page.

ATTENTION THRILL SEEKERS: Be the first to play the game and join the developers at our shark fishing launch party at Surfside Beach, Texas! Bring up to two friends and prepare for an awesome time in the surf and sun! We'll have a VIP tent for you and your lucky guests to relax in, eat amazing Texas barbecue, and play the game before anyone else! And of course, backers at this level will receive EVERY reward from the previous levels!!
